name: Wurroom
description:
Wurroom is an interactive art experience born in the minds of two holographic entities: Michael Rfdshir and Serge Bulat.
On the other hand, it's a short exploration adventure game, relieved through the experience of a palm, lost in unknown worlds and unclaimed realities.

You are just a palm, lost in a strange place where visions from the depths of the subconscious mix with fragments of distant worlds.
Just... A palm? Or an active force, capable to shake the foundations of this space?

  • Unique visual style is formed from handmade plasticine models and stop frame animation.
  • The magnificent musical design leads to a complete immersion into this peculiar surreal world.
  • Abstract storyline witn no text or dialogs.
